speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Jessica?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Jessica. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding your overdue account with City Loan Services. Can I get your address for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Jessica. Your current balance is $450. How would you like to address this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can’t pay all of it right now. Can I set up a payment plan?

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, we can do that. We usually suggest $150 per month. Does that work for you?

speaker: Customer
text: That sounds reasonable. When would my first payment be due?

speaker: Agent
text: Your first payment would be due on the 15th of next month.

speaker: Customer
text: Okay, I can do that. Can you send me the confirmation?

speaker: Agent
text: Sure! I’ll send you an email confirmation after we finish this call.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Jessica. Have a great day!
